title: Boost Immunity With Modern Ayurveda
author: Sanya Mittal
description: Did you know that you can give your immune system with modern ayurveda? Click now and read how you can use oils, herbs, teas and honey to boost your immunity.
cleaned_text: A healthy lifestyle is a must for boosting immunity but you can help your immune system win the fight with modern ayurveda. Immunity is the body's natural defence mechanism against various diseases and infections. A strong immune system helps keep the body healthy and free from illnesses. However, in today's fast-paced world, people are more prone to stress and poor lifestyle habits, which can weaken the immune system. And this when Ayurveda can come to your rescue. Here are some ways you can reap the benefits of eco therapy to boost your immunity. Boosting immunity with teas and honey There are several natural and Ayurvedic ways to boost immunity, and one of them is consuming [Jamun honey](https://vannmantra.com/collections/honey/products/jamun-honey). Jamun is a fruit that is known for its medicinal properties, and its honey is considered to be one of the most beneficial types of honey. It is rich in antioxidants and helps in boosting the immune system. It also helps in fighting infections and diseases, making it a great natural remedy for boosting immunity. [Kashmiri Kawha](https://vannmantra.com/collections/teas/products/kashmiri-kahwa) is another Ayurvedic remedy that is known to boost immunity. It is a traditional Ayurvedic tea that is made from a blend of ancient herbs and spices. It is known to help in improving digestion and fighting off infections and has been tried and tested across centuries. It is also a great remedy for reducing stress and anxiety, which can weaken the immune system. Boosting immunity with herbs and oils Another medium through which you reap the benefits of ayurvedic natural remedies is through ingesting herbs and oils. We all know [Ashwagandha](https://vannmantra.com/collections/capsules/products/ashwagandha) for its wide variety of benefits but it's also known for its immunity-boosting properties. Referred to as Indian Ginseng, this herb is known to be an adaptogen, which means it helps the body cope with stress and anxiety. It also helps in increasing the production of white blood cells, which are responsible for fighting off infections and diseases. [Turmeric curcumin](https://vannmantra.com/collections/capsules/products/turmeric-curcumin) is also known to be a great natural remedy for boosting immunity. Turmeric is known for its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, which can help in improving the immune system. It is also known to be beneficial for fighting off infections and diseases. When it comes to oils, [flaxseed oil](https://vannmantra.com/collections/capsules/products/flaxseed-oil) is also known to be a great natural remedy for boosting immunity. It is rich in omega-3 fatty acids, which are known to be beneficial for the immune system. It also helps in reducing inflammation, which can weaken the immune system. [Blackseed oil](https://vannmantra.com/collections/capsules/products/blackseed-oil) is another natural remedy that is known to boost immunity. It is rich in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds, which can help in improving the immune system. It is also known to be beneficial for fighting off infections and diseases. There are several natural and Ayurvedic ways to boost immunity as they can help ward off infections and diseases, reduce stress and anxiety but it is important to note that these remedies should be used in conjunction with a healthy lifestyle and a balanced diet to achieve the best results for a happy and healthy you.
